Title: Tadashii Itsuwari kara no Kishou
Description: ['Music videos for ', Byoushin wo Kamu, ' and ', Nouri Ue no Cracker, ' animated by the professional animator Waboku. The songs themselves were released on the album "Tadashii Itsuwari kara no Kishou" by the band "Zutto Mayonaka de Ii no ni." on November 14, 2018.']
